mapper.insert: insert all into user_tb(id,pwd,nickname,name,email,gender,phone,job,zipNo,roadAddrPart1,roadAddrPart2,addrDetail,regdate) values(#{id},#{pwd},#{nickname},#{name},#{email},#{gender},#{phone},#{job},#{zipNo},#{roadAddrPart1},#{roadAddrPart2},#{addrDetail},sysdate) into login_tb(id,pwd,nickname) values(#{id},#{pwd},#{nickname}) select * from dual
mapper.select: select count(*) from user_tb where id=#{id}
select count(*) from user_tb where nickname=#{nickname}
select count(*) from user_tb where id=#{id} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.update: update login_tb set pwd=#{pwd},nickname=#{nickname} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id,pwd,nickname from login_tb where id=#{id} and pwd=#{pwd}
